entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Rain, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 11:50 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Rain
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
